thread.title: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
thread.title_full: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'

title: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
text:
Updated: 11:34 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 | Posted: 11:34 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate' Sponsored Links The Associated Press NEW YORK â€” 
Former "Jersey Shore" star Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi doesn't have happy memories of meeting New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie . 
In a book published this week, Snooki recalls that Christie's expression was "full of hate" after she introduced herself in 2013 when both were on the boardwalk in Seaside Heights. Their tense encounter was caught on video and recounted in Snooki's "Strong is the New Sexy," in a passage titled "The Governor of New Jersey Tried to Eat Me." Joking about the size of Christie, a candidate for the Republican presidential nomination in 2016, she writes that he outweighed her by "a thousand pounds." 
The two have feuded for years. Christie has disparaged the reality TV show as bad for the state's image. Snooki has called him a bully. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
